title: Make-up brand Charlotte Tilbury hits sales of £100m
text:
Make-up brand Charlotte Tilbury, favoured by chef Nigella Lawson and lawyer Amal Clooney, clocked up revenue of £100m as speculation swirls of a takeover.

Ms Tilbury set up her eponymous business seven years ago at London's Selfridges.

Although it only has two standalone stores, both in London, its £60 eyeshadow palette and £27 magic cream can be bought online and in other shops such as John Lewis, Harvey Nichols and more recently Space NK.

Sales rose by 34pc to £100m last year, while pre-tax profits edged up £900,000 to £3.5m.
